message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,200,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $900,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $950,000 is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
